html:
6.26.18  7:40 pm   When you say "hello sexy pants" are you describing the pants that they're sexy, or something like a "smarty pants" like describing the person in the pants?

     could be either one. one of the joys of song writing is when you say things that can mean multiple things at the same time

6.26.18  7:09 pm   I'm sure you have been asked this a lot, but what inspired you to make "history of the entire world, i guess"?

     i was sick of everyone assuming i was going to make a parallel sequel to 'history of japan', of the same size and magnitude

6.26.18  6:59 pm   What happens if I write something in here?

     i might see it

6.26.18  6:37 pm   do another song 

     i almost didn't even think of that

6.26.18  6:31 pm   6.25.18  7:08 am this is insane. Do you use a multiband compressor ? If not I think you should look into it

     i've tried, but i just can't get the results i need. for example the one i have doesn't let you leave stuff alone. it is a 4 band compressor and by default it is doing a little bit to everything. it won't let you actually ignore any of the bands. it would be simpler to figure out if i could actually just take one point and say compress that point. but i don't have one that does that. i've also been searching for compression solutions to all the manual volume management that i'm doing, but even if i slam the compressors really hard it just sounds crappy and doesn't even take care of everything. each time i search for automatic solutions i just return to doing it manually. my results are getting better and better that way and i'm getting faster and faster that way

6.26.18  6:08 pm   What would a square wear if a square wore clothes?

     a box?

6.26.18  5:43 pm   Why is it that whenever I imagine you in real life, I can never imagine you having any friends?

      because all my work is made entirely myself and it takes 100% of my time to do

6.26.18  5:16 pm   youtube allows me to go through your videos frame by frame. i have a great time doing it! but your website doesn't make it so easy. would you prefer that i did not do this?

     if you download it you can do that, and my site makes it easy to download it

6.26.18  4:35 pm   why are your songs so catchy?

     it might be the only way out of here

6.26.18  4:16 pm   could you ever have live concert?

     yes

     if so, what instrument you think you would play?

     mostly voice

      would you maybe switch instruments between songs or something like that?

     yes

6.26.18  4:11 pm   what are the advantages and disadvantages of questions

     the advantages are you get to find answers. the disadvantage is you might not like the answers

6.26.18  4:10 pm   i know humanity will never get all the answers. it's frustrating! i'm continually annoyed because of it. what can i do?

     i don't know but you can make answers. you could have fun making answers

6.26.18  4:05 pm   dear bill, why do you curse in your videos? also why don't you curse in your videos?

     ah that's a good question. the answer is because i can and can't

6.26.18  3:59 pm   what shouldn't i do

     evil?

6.26.18  3:41 pm   hello mr. William James Wurtz II, i am thinking of running for president but i can't think of a good running mate. do you have any recommendations?

     how about bambi

6.26.18  3:24 pm   wanna do it?

     sure

6.26.18  3:09 pm   Can you give us some improv lessons?

And I'm talking about improv on the keyboard, not the vocal stuff.

     if you spend enough time with the thing it should teach itself. at least that's what happened to me

6.26.18  2:04 pm   are you proud of your work?

     yes but it needs to be better

6.26.18  1:57 pm   Where is New Cannan

     connecticut

6.26.18  1:31 pm   Any song lyrics that you're listening to right now?

     i always listen to the music/lyrics together at the same time. they are merged together

     I just heard "woahwoahwoahwoahwoah woah" then the rest of the song, including various other lyrics, played

It was pretty good

6.26.18  12:51 pm   What time is acceptable?

     all time is acceptable

6.26.18  11:31 am   Do views and downloads from your website help your chart position?

     no, because they don't have the ISRC code embedded. even if they did i'm not sure if it would count ..... i don't think it would but it might. if anyone knows this i would be curious to hear....

6.26.18  11:16 am   6.25.18  8:32 pm ok man, i JUST checked, and it is not there.

     i just checked and it is there

6.26.18  11:00 am   is hello sexy pants really just i wanna be a movie star 2?

     no

6.26.18  10:46 am   I've heard all these people talking about how side chaining is awesome but quick question: What the fuck is side chaining?

     it's like when you use one thing to control another. one example i've heard of is using the volume of the vocal to control the reverb. so when the vocal is singing, the reverb is less. and then the reverb kicks in during the spaces. i think this is a common way to use it, which i should try doing but i haven't tried it yet. i tend to do that stuff manually

6.26.18  10:28 am   how to not be angry?

     what helps for me is understanding

6.26.18  10:25 am   Does your life suck?

     no

6.26.18  10:24 am   6.26.18  2:03 am was it intended as a political statement, as opposed to a friendly one?

     it was friendly

6.26.18  10:11 am   Uhhhhh Bill bad news

(sorry sent the last one unintentially)

https://www.isrc.net/FAQ-Soundscan.php

According to this link you also need a barcode number (UPC or EAN) to register for the service that can put your songs on Billboard.

Not sure if you have the barcode number, that's why I'm putting this here

     that's not bad news, i have all that stuff and i've done all that stuff. i can get on the charts just fine, if i get enough downloads and streaming plays on spotify, itunes, etc. But if i can sneak that metadata into my music videos, then my youtube views will also count, which i think will accelerate things a bit

6.26.18  10:06 am   thoughts on food

     it is helpful, and useful

6.26.18  9:57 am   did you watch the Korean summit on TV, if so, did you like it (I thought that the handshake was the best part)?

     i just saw the BLR

6.26.18  9:57 am   i've never really been interested in making original music even though i listen to music a lot and enjoy playing other artists' songs on piano and ukulele from time to time. i also like singing a lot although i'm not too good of a singer. Sometimes i record those "covers" i make with my phone and listen to them again and again (egoistic??). however, ilve recently liked the idea of original music more. i have an ipad with garageband, a crappy ukulele, and my voice. could this be the start? 

     sure

6.26.18  9:52 am   it's finally summer vacation and i'm really excited to finally get going on allotting all of my time to 'building an empire,' since all during the school year i have to focus on adhering to someone else's curriculum. yet i'm still anxious because i know when summer ends and i get back to school (i'm going into 11th grade) i'm going to have to start interacting with others again, and i don't know how to be nice and genuine with others while still socially isolating myself to have as much time as possible to get done the stuff i want to get done (i don't want to mislead others into thinking i'm interested in spending more time with them than i do). you seem to live a solitary lifestyle and i'm wondering: how did you handle this when you were in school or at least when you had to be around people on a frequent basis? thanks.

     i wrote songs in class

6.26.18  9:41 am   you should try selling umbrellas with a clipart of an umbrella(your logo) on it. it might be a hit

     i think music and videos will be a bigger hit for me

6.26.18  9:37 am   I have a green umbrella in my closet, any ideas on what to do with it?

     you could use it to protect yourself from the rain

6.26.18  9:23 am   Do you work on any new material at the moment? ie write new songs/do piano improvs.  Or is all of your time and energy spent on completing your back catalog?  If the latter is true...is that frustrating at all?  I feel like it would be to me.  Thanks

     almost every song i've released in the past year has been found in the archives as a fragment, and then written to completion at the time just before recording

6.26.18  9:07 am   Are light bulbs sexy too? 

     i never thought about it but yes

6.26.18  7:25 am   is damien maymdien a balloon

     possibly

6.26.18  7:09 am   dear bill wurtz: how do you do to earn enough money to buy food to survive and continue making the stuff you like in the meantime while you cannot make money out of what you do? Serious question from someone that works in an office to survive and regrets having no free time to make the shit I like to do (mostly, videogames, music, movies and anything involving writing) because in the nights I'm just too fucking tired to do anything useful and fall sleep instead, feeling regret that my body doesn't have strength enough to continue without sleeping 14 more hours, but I can still wank once or twice :(

     a suggestion i have would be to use the time you already spend playing video games, watching movies, and listening to music, to start making the stuff instead

6.26.18  6:59 am   what would be the correct answer to "thabk you"?

     no answer needed

6.26.18  6:20 am   What if you don't have thoughts but thoughts have you?

     that seems normal

6.26.18  5:57 am   why can't you get an ISCR thingy?

     i can, i already have them

6.26.18  5:14 am   hey bill, I was womdering, I think your history of japan video is what put you on a lot of people's radars, but it's pretty extremely different than your usual content; what inspired you to deviate from your usual style to make the world's best educational vid?

      just when i was getting sick of making short videos, i ended up in a predicament where i had to make even more shorter videos. and i guess i snapped

6.26.18  4:29 am   How long did it take to make on of the documentary vids

     3 months, or 11 months, depending on which one it was

6.26.18  4:28 am   i can't do stuff. u could say stuff to somehow make me want to do stuff

     why exactly do you want to want to do stuff

6.26.18  3:31 am   You have to make this world by your own thoughts, or this world will break you apart.
Do you agree?

     not entirely

6.26.18  3:19 am   if you were to perform concerts live, how would you do it? would you end a song and then perform the next without any sort of transition, or would you create something to link songs together? or maybe both, or neither?

     both

6.26.18  3:02 am   Are you still alive cause you don't seem like it

     how so

6.26.18  2:29 am   What would you have done if you were born 50 years ago, and had (roughly) the same interests? How would you feel with the lack of tools available to you?

     there would be plenty of tools just different tools

6.26.18  2:06 am   of course you'd like it to be faster but is your current pace of a video about every two months acceptable for you?

     not even close
